    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
          throws OpenDataRegistryException
        Inits the client implementation.
        Throws:
        OpenDataRegistryException - If the implementation could not be initialized properly.

      • init

        void init(Properties props)
        Inits the client implementation with a set of properties. In case of the standard CKAN implementation the following properties can be set: 
           ckan.url
   ckan.authorization.key
        Parameters:
        props - the list of properties.

      • status

        String status()
        Status. General status as String. The format and the contained information depend on the implementation. In case of the default CKAN implementation this is a JSON Object with standard CKAn Server information.
        Returns:
        the status string
